channel.title: I just made this new air buyer
channel.description:
i pretty must just edited moon111's mind buyer but here
{=============================================] auto mind buyer v1.0 by moon111 edited by killer kure
Update Log: 1.0 first release
NOTE: you need to edit line 21 in the wait part chose how long to wait 1000= 1 sec
must be in buying screen!
[=============================================} program autobuyminds;
begin repeat wait(100) MoveMouse(281,83) wait(100); ClickMouse(281,83,false) ///////////setup///////////// wait(30);//<--edit here//1000 = 1 second //////////end setup///////// MoveMouse(282,153) ClickMouse(282,153,true) wait(100) until(false) end.

item.title: I just made this new air buyer
item.dc:creator: @Sebo Sebo
item.description:
@Sebo wrote:

Uhh, Nice Script for a first that was editied =). But it is detectable because of your movemousesmooth, Try adding movemouseSmoothEX. less detecable, but its hard finding the right one to make it look like a human is typing it.

Read full topic
item.source: I just made this new air buyer

item.title: I just made this new air buyer
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

If you mean do you get banned while using the program, then I’m not sure. I’ve only been banned once, and I found out when I tried to log on. What they do is if they see your character performing suspicious behavior like the same place clicks, they flag you. You can get flagged for many things, and once you have enough evidence against you, they ban.

As for anti ban, you’d have to look into a better mouse moving procedure, try SRL and use MMouse. And in your waits, use this instead. Wait(1000+random(200)); That way the script will wait somewhere between 1000 and 1199 instead of waiting 1000 every time.

If you get SRL you can look at the antiban.scar file and get some good procedures.

-Weibs.

Read full topic
item.source: I just made this new air buyer

item.source: I just made this new air buyer

item.title: I just made this new air buyer
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

Sorry if I came off sounding cranky, didn’t intend it to. And thank you for adding that part about you editing the script.

But I was serious, this script will get you banned. It uses coordinates, so the mouse clicks in the same place every time, and the wait times are the same every time.

Read full topic

item.source: I just made this new air buyer

item.title: I just made this new air buyer
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

Ok, first of all, you copied this script. I know you admitted you did, but you changed the commentary so that it read by killer kure, which its not.

Second of all, it uses coordinates which will get you banned instantly, it doesn’t even have randoms in the waits.

I’m sorry, but this script is pretty much useless, and never claim a script that isn’t yours, put something like ‘edited by killer kure’.

-Weibs

Read full topic
item.source: I just made this new air buyer

item.title: I just made this new air buyer
item.dc:creator: @killer_kure killer kure
item.description:
@killer_kure wrote:

i pretty must just edited moon111’s mind buyer but here

{=============================================]
auto mind buyer
v1.0
by moon111 edited by killer kure

Update Log:
1.0 first release

NOTE: you need to edit line 21 in the wait
part chose how long to wait 1000= 1 sec

must be in buying screen!

[=============================================}
program autobuyminds;

begin
repeat
wait(100)
MoveMouse(281,83)
wait(100);
ClickMouse(281,83,false)
///////////setup/////////////
wait(30);//<–edit here//1000 = 1 second
//////////end setup/////////
MoveMouse(282,153)
ClickMouse(282,153,true)
wait(100)
until(false)
end.

Read full topic
